headlines.description: Tottenham moved above Chelsea and into third as a goal from Victor Wanyama and two from Lucas Mours gave them a 3-0 win over Huddersfield.
headlines.shortLinkText: Moura hits hat trick as Spurs thrash Huddersfield

events.name: AFC Bournemouth at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: A humiliating 5-0 defeat to Bournemouth at the Amex Stadium left Brighton still very much embroiled in a Premier League relegation battle.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brighton slip to humiliating defeat at home to Bournemouth

headlines.description: Chris Wood scored twice as Burnley took a major step towards Premier League safety with a 2-0 win over fellow strugglers Cardiff City.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wood double gives Burnley win over Cardiff in relegation scrap

headlines.description: Relegated Fulham hit Everton's hopes of Europa League qualification for next season as they beat them 2-0 at Craven Cottage.
Southampton made a big step towards securing top-flight football next season after two first-half goals from Nathan Redmond steered them towards a 3
headlines.shortLinkText: Redmond double helps Southampton beat timid Wolves 3-1

events.name: West Ham United at Manchester United

headlines.description: Two penalties from Paul Pogba earned Manchester United a 2-1 win over West Ham at Old Trafford as they moved up to fifth place.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pogba penalties seal victory for Man United
